Class SpecialVMModel

java.lang.Object
RegularVMModel
SpecialVMModel
public class SpecialVMModel extends RegularVMModel
The SpecialVM class represents a special vending machine, which is a subclass of RegularVM. The special vending machine can handle a shopping cart, calculate cart total cost, and buy all items in the cart at once.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialVMModel

      public SpecialVMModel(String name)
      Creates a new SpecialVM object with the given name and initializes its attributes. The shopping cart is also initialized as an empty ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the special vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • getCart

      public ArrayList<ItemSlot> getCart()
      Get the list of items in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of ItemSlot objects representing the items in the shopping cart.

    • getCartTotalCost

      public float getCartTotalCost()
      Get the total cost of items in the shopping cart.
      Returns:
      The total cost of items in the shopping cart.

    • addToCart

      public void addToCart(ItemSlot itemSlot)
      Add an item to the shopping cart. Use this method to add one quantity of an item to the cart and update the cart's total cost.
      Parameters:
      itemSlot - The item slot from which the item will be added to the cart.

    • buyCart

      public void buyCart(float payment)
      Buy all items in the shopping cart at once. This method removes one quantity of each item in the cart from their respective item slots, adds the transactions to the history, updates the cart total cost, payment, and the vending machine's total cost and payment.
      Parameters:
      payment - The payment made by the customer for the items in the cart.
